solver
Class Solver3

java.lang.Object
  solver.Solver
      solver.GESolver
          solver.Solver3
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Solver3
extends GESolver

Class for iterative generalized eigenproblem solver. It solves for the smallest eigenvalues (assumed > 0) and corresponding eigenvectors in the generalized eigenproblem using the subspace iteration method. This class uses an external executable file called "SSPACE.exe".

Author:
Murat Artim
See Also:
Serialized Form

nRoot_

private int nRoot_
Number of required eigenvalues and eigenvectors.

rTol_

private double rTol_
Convergence tolerance on eigenvalues (1.e-06 or smaller).

nitem_

private int nitem_
Maximum number of subspace iterations permitted (usually set to 16). It must be increased if a solution has not converged.

Constructor Detail

Solver3

public Solver3(java.lang.String name,
               int nRoot,
               double rTol,
               int nitem)
Creates subspace iterative solver.

Parameters:
name - The name of solver.
nRoot - Number of required eigenvalues and eigenvectors.
rTol - Convergence tolerance on eigenvalues (1.e-06 or smaller).
nitem - Maximum number of subspace iterations permitted (usually set to 16). It must be increased if a solution has not converged.

initialize

public void initialize(Mat matA,
                       Mat matB)
Description copied from class: GESolver
Initializes solver.

Specified by:
initialize in class GESolver
Parameters:
matA - Coefficient matrix A. Has to be in USP form (assumed positive definite).
matB - The second coefficient matrix (B). Has to be upper-symmetric-packed matrix (USPMat).

solve

public void solve(Mat matA,
                  Mat matB,
                  DVec eigval,
                  GPSMat eigvec,
                  int nEigval)
Description copied from class: GESolver
Solves generalized eigenvalue problem.

Specified by:
solve in class GESolver
Parameters:
matA - Coefficient matrix A.
matB - Coefficient matrix B.
eigval - Vector for storing the eigenvalues.
eigvec - Matrix for storing the eigenvectors.
nEigval - Number of computed eigenvalues.
